item.title: Digital Overdose Conference Resources & Readings
item.description: Video Youtube Files for the exercises: slides pcap file Resources - pcap analysis Sguil info About Packet sniffers Tcpdump introduction Tcpdump man pages Tcpdump flags explained and extra info Tcpdump guide by Daniel Miessler ET PRO Rule categories information Virtual Machine setup - Kali Linux How to install mono + Network Miner Interesting reads Analyzing network traffic basic linux tools (pdf by SANS institute) Extracting files from packet captures (pdf by SANS institute) Tutorial: Extracting files from pcap in Wireshark (malware-traffic-analysis.
